title: Casting Fear during fiddlesticks ult
body:
Before these last patches whenever you cast Fear on a champion while channeling his ultimate it would use it right after my ult would finish channeling. Now it seems that i have to cast fear immediately after my ult lands or it won't work.

Does anyone have a workaround?

It used to be i could start channeling my ult and then cast fear so that when i finished channeling and blinked it would automatically cast it right away. When paired with flash this made fid ults actually feel strong and that i could land my fear on intended target.

Now it seems that even when im smartcast spamming my fear there is still that half a second of delay that ezreals or leblanc or whoever can easily blink out of range.
